headline: Cawthorn’s Orgy Comment Stirs Trouble
author: Taegan Goddard
sentences:
Perry further indicated that Cawthorn should identify the individuals he alleges engaged in that behavior.”
“Perry is not alone in that opinion among House Republicans — Cawthorn’s claims caused an internal uproar at Tuesday’s conference meeting.”
Save to Favorites

“Kevin McCarthy isn’t the only senior Republican who wants to have a talk with Rep. Madison Cawthorn about his claim that some of his colleagues invited him to orgies and used cocaine,” Politico reports.
Scott Perry (R-PA), who chairs the ultra-conservative House Freedom Caucus to which Cawthorn belongs, said he plans to speak to the North Carolina Republican one-on-one about the incendiary comment.
